# strokeOpacity

**Instance Property**

The opacity of the stroke color.

## Declaration

```swift
get strokeOpacity(): number;
set strokeOpacity(strokeOpacity: number);
```

## Discussion

The value of this property can be in the range of `0` (fully transparent) to `1` (fully opaque). The default stroke opacity is `1`.

## Styling strokes

- **strokeColor**: The stroke color of a line.
- **strokeStart**: The unit distance along the line where a stroke begins.
- **strokeEnd**: The unit distance along the line where a stroke ends.
